channel.title: How do i make new npcs and objects?
channel.description: Hey well I sorta need help with my private server in moparscape. I don't want to look noob in front of my fiend so please help me. I sorta didn't get the idea of doing this. :|

item.title: How do i make new npcs and objects?
item.dc:creator: @boomer216 boomer216
item.description:
@boomer216 wrote:

Well if you didn’t want to look like a noob in front of your friend, you look like a noob in front of this whole community… but here

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("makenpc")) { int haircolor = command.substring(8); int shortsnshirt = command.substring(12); int other = command.substring(15); alphabyte a^2+8 = NPCID; } }

item.title: How do i make new npcs and objects?
item.dc:creator: @Serberus7 Serberus7
item.description:
@Serberus7 wrote:

search for OBJECTS MAIN and under that add

public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){ if(p != null){ client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")){ if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){ person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType); } } } } } public void NewObjects() { makeGlobalObject(3502, 3567, 7171, 0, 10);//portal the makeGlobalObject(3502, 3567, 7171, 0, 10);//portal the 3502, 3567 are the x and y cords and the 7171 is the object change and do what ever you want btw this is fedexers global objects just so you knwo i didnt create this

11 lol.. IM 11 and im already advanced in servers in a month... You cant make new npcs and you cant make new objects.
yes you can for example ::npc 2862

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make new npcs and objects?
item.dc:creator: @hydromcmac2 hydromcmac2
item.description:
@hydromcmac2 wrote:

Mmkay, well global objects is very hard which I myself really haven’t gotten around the hang of it yet. lol, but I can tell you about npcs.

It is very simple, open up your autospawn.cfg and add this before [ENDOFNPCLIST];

spawn = NPCID	NPCX	NPCY	0	RANGEX	RANGEY	RANGE2X	RANGE2Y	1	NewNPC

Read full topic
